publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7248 John Swinney: The Budget (Scotland) Act 2010 Amendment (No. 2) Order 2010—That the Finance Committee recommends that the Budget (Scotland) Act 2010 Amendment (No. 2) Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*
